languages.text: "Зато ты один в этом коридоре и никогда не задаешься вопросом, кто долбит в дверь с той стороны и как долго выдержат хлипкие петли твоего разума".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Зато ты один в этом коридоре и никогда не задаешься вопросом, кто долбит в дверь с той стороны и как долго выдержат хлипкие петли твоего разума".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "At least you're alone in that corridor and will never have to wonder who's banging on the door from the other side — and how long the flimsy hinges of your mind will hold."
languages.original_text: "Зато ты один в этом коридоре и никогда не задаешься вопросом, кто долбит в дверь с той стороны и как долго выдержат хлипкие петли твоего разума".

traits.locale_text: "At least you're alone in that corridor and will never have to wonder who's banging on the door from the other side and how long the flimsy hinges of your mind will hold."
"At least you're alone in that corridor and will never have to wonder who's banging on the door from the other side and how long the flimsy hinges of your mind will hold."
"At least you're alone in that corridor and will never have to wonder who's banging on the door from the other side — and how long the flimsy hinges of your mind will hold."
"At least you're alone in that corridor and will never have to wonder who's banging on the door from the other side — and how long the flimsy hinges of your mind will hold."
"At least you're alone in that corridor and will never have to wonder who's banging on the door from the other side — and how long the flimsy hinges of your mind will hold."
"At least you're alone in that corridor and will never have to wonder who's banging on the door from the other side — and how long the flimsy hinges of your mind will hold."

languages.text: “至少走廊里只有你一个人，你不用担心会有谁从另一边敲门，也不用担心你那脆弱的脑子还能支撑多久。”
languages.original_text: "At least you're alone in that corridor and will never have to wonder who's banging on the door from the other side — and how long the flimsy hinges of your mind will hold."

traits.locale_text: “至少走廊里只有你一个人，你不用担心会有谁从另一边敲门，也不用担心你那脆弱的脑子还能支撑多久。”

languages.text: «Al menos no está a solas en ese pasillo y no necesita preguntarse quién golpea la puerta desde el otro lado... ni cuánto tiempo aguantarán los endebles goznes de su mente».
languages.original_text: "At least you're alone in that corridor and will never have to wonder who's banging on the door from the other side — and how long the flimsy hinges of your mind will hold."

traits.locale_text: «Al menos no está a solas en ese pasillo y no necesita preguntarse quién golpea la puerta desde el otro lado... ni cuánto tiempo aguantarán los endebles goznes de su mente».

languages.text: « Vous, au moins, vous êtes seul dans ce tunnel et vous n'aurez jamais à vous soucier de savoir qui tambourine de l'autre côté de la porte... en vous demandant combien de temps ses gonds fragiles tiendront encore. »
languages.original_text: "At least you're alone in that corridor and will never have to wonder who's banging on the door from the other side — and how long the flimsy hinges of your mind will hold."

traits.locale_text: « Vous, au moins, vous êtes seul dans ce tunnel et vous n'aurez jamais à vous soucier de savoir qui tambourine de l'autre côté de la porte... en vous demandant combien de temps ses gonds fragiles tiendront encore. »

languages.text: 「少なくとも、あなたはあの廊下に一人きりなんだから、向こう側から誰がドアを叩いているのか、そしてあなたの心の脆弱な蝶番がいつまで耐えられるのかを考える必要はないわよね」
languages.original_text: "At least you're alone in that corridor and will never have to wonder who's banging on the door from the other side — and how long the flimsy hinges of your mind will hold."

traits.locale_text: 「少なくとも、あなたはあの廊下に一人きりなんだから、向こう側から誰がドアを叩いているのか、そしてあなたの心の脆弱な蝶番がいつまで耐えられるのかを考える必要はないわよね」

languages.text: "En azından o koridorda yalnızsın ve diğer taraftan kimin kapıyı çaldığını ve zihninin dayanıksız menteşelerinin ne kadar dayanacağını merak etmek zorunda kalmayacaksın."
languages.original_text: "At least you're alone in that corridor and will never have to wonder who's banging on the door from the other side — and how long the flimsy hinges of your mind will hold."

traits.locale_text: "En azından o koridorda yalnızsın ve diğer taraftan kimin kapıyı çaldığını ve zihninin dayanıksız menteşelerinin ne kadar dayanacağını merak etmek zorunda kalmayacaksın."

languages.text: "Wenigstens seid Ihr alleine in diesem Gang und müsst Euch niemals fragen, wer von der anderen Seite an die Tür klopft – und wie lange die schwachen Scharniere Eures Verstands halten werden."
languages.original_text: "At least you're alone in that corridor and will never have to wonder who's banging on the door from the other side — and how long the flimsy hinges of your mind will hold."

traits.locale_text: "Wenigstens seid Ihr alleine in diesem Gang und müsst Euch niemals fragen, wer von der anderen Seite an die Tür klopft – und wie lange die schwachen Scharniere Eures Verstands halten werden."
